text: Michael Frontzeck (born 26 March 1964) is a German professional football coach of VfL Wolfsburg and former player who played as a left back. He earned 19 caps for the (West) German national team and was in the squad at Euro 1992. ==Coaching record== Managerial record by team and tenure Team From To Record Alemannia Aachen 13 September 2006 19 May 2007 Arminia Bielefeld 4 January 2008 17 May 2009 Borussia Mönchengladbach 3 June 2009 13 February 2011 FC St. Pauli 3 October 2012 6 November 2013 Hannover 96 20 April 2015 21 December 2015 1\. title: Michael Frontzeck
